== Description ==
Updates the archived status of the specified blog with the value provided, can be used to set a blog as archived or not.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php update_archived( $id, $archived );Â ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$id|integer|The id of the blog to be updated.}}
{{Parameter|$archived|boolean|The new archived status value.}}

== Return Values ==
; <tt>(boolean)</tt> : Returns the new archived status of the specified blog.
